channel.title: How to use hamachi
channel.description:
This is how you get and use hamachi:
Step 1: go to this link to download hamachi : www.hamachi.cc Step 2: on the right hand side of the screen push download for free Step 3: type in all the stuff needed Step 4: click the button: Go to files Step 5: push download Step 6: wait for it to download Step 7: open hamachi ( if it does not open automaticly ) Step 8: find a name/network you want to join Step 9: there is 3 buttons at the bottom of the hamachi screen, click on the one that looks like a triangle Step 10: a screen will apear, type in the name/network you want to join step 11: type in the password of the network you want to join step 12: push join Step 13: now you can talk to anyone on the name/network you joined Step 14: YOUR DONE !!!!!!!!!
If you have any more questions just ask me and i will be glad to help you out with anything to do with hamachi!

item.title: How to use hamachi
item.dc:creator: @master_pker master_pker
item.description:
@master_pker wrote:

This is how you get and use hamachi:

Step 1: go to this link to download hamachi : www.hamachi.cc
Step 2: on the right hand side of the screen push download for free
Step 3: type in all the stuff needed
Step 4: click the button: Go to files
Step 5: push download
Step 6: wait for it to download
Step 7: open hamachi ( if it does not open automaticly )
Step 8: find a name/network you want to join
Step 9: there is 3 buttons at the bottom of the hamachi screen, click on the one that looks like a triangle
Step 10: a screen will apear, type in the name/network you want to join
step 11: type in the password of the network you want to join
step 12: push join
Step 13: now you can talk to anyone on the name/network you joined
Step 14: YOUR DONE !!!

 If you have any more questions just ask me and i will be glad to help you out with anything to do with hamachi!
